spirit:field.spirit:name: dgatel
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection Gate Length \x Length=4*DGATEL*50ns+0.8탎 0000: 0.8 탎 1000: 2.4 탎 1111: 3.8 탎

spirit:field.spirit:name: dgates
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection Gate Start\x Start=4*DGATES*50ns + 1.6탎 00000: 1.6 탎 01111: 4.6 탎 11111: 7.8 탎

spirit:field.spirit:name: dummy_fe
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bMacrovision input signal 0: interlace signal 1: progressive signal

spirit:field.spirit:name: cvbsdetect
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection result for CVBS detection\x 0: no CVBS detected 1: CVBS detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: ycdetect
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection result for Y/C detection\x 0: no Y/C detected 1: Y/C detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: usr_r_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection result for Y/C detection\x 0: no Y/C detected 1: Y/C detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: sha_r_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection result for Y/C detection\x 0: no Y/C detected 1: Y/C detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: mvstart
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bStart line of macrovision detection\x 00000: line 4/267 (525) // 1/314 (625) 00111: line 11/274 (525) // 8/321 (625) 11111: line 35/298 (525) // 32/345 (625) Note: line numbering refers to tables 1a.1 and 1b.1 of the macrovision copy protection process

spirit:field.spirit:name: mvstop
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bEnd line of macrovision detection\x 000000: line 4/267 (525) // 1/314 (625) 001101: line 17/280 (525) // 14/327 (625) 111111: line 67/330 (525) // 64/357 (625) Note: line numbering refers to tables 1a.1 and 1b.1 of the macrovision copy protection proces

spirit:field.spirit:name: usr_ali
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bDetection result for Y/C detection\x 0: no Y/C detected 1: Y/C detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: usr_rw_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bEnd line of macrovision detection\x 000000: line 4/267 (525) // 1/314 (625) 001101: line 17/280 (525) // 14/327 (625) 111111: line 67/330 (525) // 64/357 (625) Note: line numbering refers to tables 1a.1 and 1b.1 of the macrovision copy protection proces

spirit:field.spirit:name: sha_rw2
spirit:field.spirit:description: %EMPTY%

spirit:field.spirit:name: wd_16_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bEnd line of macrovision detection\x 000000: line 4/267 (525) // 1/314 (625) 001101: line 17/280 (525) // 14/327 (625) 111111: line 67/330 (525) // 64/357 (625) Note: line numbering refers to tables 1a.1 and 1b.1 of the macrovision copy protection proces

spirit:field.spirit:name: wd_16_test2
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bEnd line of macrovision detection\x 000000: line 4/267 (525) // 1/314 (625) 001101: line 17/280 (525) // 14/327 (625) 111111: line 67/330 (525) // 64/357 (625) Note: line numbering refers to tables 1a.1 and 1b.1 of the macrovision copy protection proces

spirit:field.spirit:name: usr_w_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: bla bla bla

spirit:field.spirit:name: w_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: bla bla bla

spirit:field.spirit:name: sha_w_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: bla bla bla

spirit:field.spirit:name: r_test
spirit:field.spirit:description: bla bla bla

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs_to_ists
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bTiimeout Interrupt Status

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs_to_ien
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bTimeout Interrupt Enable\x 1 = Timeout is signalled to transaction originator via OCP "SInterrupt"

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs_to_rerr_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bTimeout Read-Error Enable\x 1 = Timeout is signalled to transaction originator as read-error

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs_to_val
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bTimeout Value\x Start-value of timeout-counter in terms of OCP bus cycles 3'b000 = timeout detection disabled 3'b001 = 16 3'b010 = 32 3'b011 = 64 3'b100 = 128 3'b101 = 256 3'b110 = 512 3'b111 = 1024

spirit:field.spirit:name: rs_to_addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: \bTimeout Address\x Indicates the address that the last timeout occurred. Will only be updated if rs_to_ists is cleared.
